explanation: [0-0] A hand holds a tube of toothpaste and places it on a white tablet with a cracked screen, which is placed on a pink blanket.

[0-3] The hand squeezes toothpaste onto the damaged screen of the tablet, then uses a finger to spread it, dispersing it across the cracks on the screen. Next, a piece of towel is used to wipe the toothpaste clean, and the cracks on the tablet screen disappear. The scene transitions to a room bathed in yellowish light, where a young man with a beard, wearing a white shirt, holds a cat and speaks while looking ahead. He's also holding a wooden toy in his hand.

[3-9] The scene changes again, this time to a kitchen. The man is sitting by a wooden table. Behind him are grey cabinets and cupboards, while several cups are placed on the brown countertop. The cat sits on a grey chair next to the man. The man picks up a black mobile phone with his right hand and places it in front of the cat. The cat curiously approaches the phone, gently rubbing its mouth against the edge of the phone. Subsequently, the man places the phone on the table, picks up a hammer, and strikes the phone twice. The phone's screen cracks as a result. The man picks up the phone and shows the screen to the camera, revealing the cracks on the screen.

[9-19] Subsequently, the phone is placed back on the table. The man picks up the toothpaste with his left hand and squeezes it onto the cracked phone screen. Then, he holds the phone with his left hand and uses his right index finger to evenly spread the toothpaste, covering the entire screen. Afterward, he uses a white paper towel to wipe off the toothpaste. Finally, the man lifts the phone to the camera with his right hand, but the cracks on the phone screen are still clearly visible.
